results.name: A bigomega (A001222) analog  based on the Ludic sieve (A255127): a(1) = 0; for n > 1, a(n) = 1 + a(A302032(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..32768
Index entries for sequences generated by sieves
program: \\ Assuming that A269379 and A269380 have been precomputed:
